name: Planetas
description:
Planetas is a game where the player has to use the gravitational acceleration of other planets to collide with other asteroids as fast as they can. 

Controls

W, A, S, D &  Arrow keys for direction

to orbit around planets.

Players have to lock in orbit and gain acceleration in order to get higher points when they collide with other asteroids. 

However, if you say too long the planet's gravity would drag you in and destroy you past a certain point. 

If you pass the limitations (marked by the inner line around the Planet's rings), the gravitational pull of the planet would be too strong for you to escape. 

Special Thanks to Chad Cable, who guided me through this project, and Hanjin Ahn, Wendy Kim, Jacqueline Cao, Hyeon Sim, Fox Miao, Ethan Chamberlain and many other friends who helped. 

Background Music - Alter ego

TuneCore Japan 

Alter ego · Caramel Column
